page.title: 15ALKHAMHURST KENNELS
page.content: To the north-east of Alkham village along the B2O6O are the Alkhamhurst Kennels, which board cats and dogs. A trimming and grooming service is also provided for the locality. The kennels cover five acres and have accomodation for 11O dogs and 11O cats. 9O% of clients live within ten miles of the kennels. A choice of menu is available. Charges range from Â£3.1O for giant dogs to Â£1.9O per day for cats, a 2O% reduction is made for more than one animal sharing accomodation. A quarantine service is provided. Animals are transported from Dover and Folkestone docks by licensed carriers and are innoculated on arrival. 9O% of these clients are connected with British Forces serving in Germany. Two vets attend the kennels which are run by a husband and wife with three full time workers and some part time help.
